title: No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are returned. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: No results are found when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X).
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), the expected behavior is to display the search results.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the IDE 
2. Access the Package view 
3. Perform a search for declarations using the selection and dialog feature (1GLDN1X) 
4. Note that no results are returned. 

Expected behavior: 
- Results should be displayed when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
